name: ParaGame
description:
This is the first release of our Paragliding game prototype. There are many many things wrong with it. We know.

The idea is to provide a physics sandbox that can be played with and tweaked to achieve various paraglider dynamic behaviours.

Leave constructive comments/suggestions here:
https://youtu.be/WTVOkz7ihXI

This Paraglider simulator is a collaboration between Ricardo Castro and Andre Bandarra.
More information on this game as well as its development history can be found here.
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHqVk-6I8KNca4u4-6L7EPCPTA7i29xIv
